main.name: Rob Quinn
main.occupation: Pega Certified Senior System Architect (CSSA) - Full Stack Developer
main.description: Experienced Application Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the insurance industry. Skilled in Pega PRPC, Full Stack Web Development (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Java, Bootstrap, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, SQL), Moble Development, and Test Automation.
main.bio: Pega Certified Senior Architect (CSSA) working at Genworth Financial as an Application Developer. Strong background in QA Testing, Test Automation and Automation Frameworks using Selenium.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
